publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

monogr.title: In the yere of thyncarnacion of our lord Ih [es] u crist M.CCCC.lxxx. and in the xx. yere of the regne of kyng Edward the fourthe, atte requeste of dyuerce gentilmen I haue endeuourd me to enprinte the cronicles of Englond : as in this booke shall by the suffraunce of god folowe

div.p: IN the yere of thyncarnacion of our lord Jhū crist M.CCCC.lxxx. And in the xx. yere of the Regne of kyng Edward the fourthe / Atte requeste of dyuerce gentilmen I haue endeuourd me to enprinte the cronicles of Englond as in this booke shall by the suffraunce of god folowe / And to thende that euery man may see and shortly fynde suche mater as it shall plese hym to see or rede I haue ordeyned a table of the maters shortly compiled & chapitred as here shall folowe which booke begynneth at Albyne how she with her susters fonde this land first & named it Albion & endeth at the beginnyng of the regne of our said souerain lord kyng Edward the iiij.
